Room.Name: Hafnia Circle Road/West Gate Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the road which circumferences the town of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: The elves lay out beautiful cities, and Hafnia is no exception. The road you are on follows a geometrically perfect curve. A short distance to the north there seems to be an entrance to a combat field of some sort. The road splits to the west towards the western city gates. Along the east side of the road there are several shops, and what looks like a social hall for some of the elven elite.
